head.title: Technology Expo Set for County Center

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: Technology Expo Set for County Center

abstract.p: Solutions 2000 Business and Technology Expo is scheduled for September 21 at County Center in White Plains, NY; photo (S)

block.p: Solutions 2000 Business and Technology Expo is scheduled for Sept. 21 at the County Center in White Plains.

The exposition is expected to include 100 exhibitors who will offer information on creating Web sites, expanding local and international markets and using new technology, said Richard D. Schaab, vice president of the Westchester County Association, one of the Expo's organizers. The featured speaker will be Bill Daugherty, the founder of IWon.com.
The Expo will be open to the public free of charge.
Solutions 2000 Business and Technology Expo is scheduled for Sept. 21 at the County Center in White Plains.

The exposition is expected to include 100 exhibitors who will offer information on creating Web sites, expanding local and international markets and using new technology, said Richard D. Schaab, vice president of the Westchester County Association, one of the Expo's organizers. The featured speaker will be Bill Daugherty, the founder of IWon.com.
The Expo will be open to the public free of charge.
Information is available by calling Amy Allen at (914) 948-6444, extension 25, or by visiting www.westchester.org/ solutions.htm.
